name: Spark-X-2025
description: Whatsapp bot developed by Carl William

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically and send to you(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_REACT.description: Received messages will be automalically reacted on(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

CHATBOT.description: the chatbot will automatically reply messages with texts.

CHATBOT1.description: the chatbot will automatically reply messages with audio.

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: The bot will like all posted updates automatically (type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_READ.description: Your contact messages will be read automatically (type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other users can't use your bot in pm (type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: put A name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mod

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (this is a must)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (this is a must)

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , the code you receive after linking the device...(Make sure it begins with SPARK-X-2025)

NUMERO_OWNER.desc: Your number , dont put '+' and put you area code(exemple of togo '228')....Must put the number connected to the session ID

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning commandes

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 to indicate that you are online even if you are not. 2 to indicate that you are currently typing a message. 3 to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTIDELETE1.description: if you want to enable anti delete message put yes else put no..(This feature is for live conversation)

AUTO_REPLY.descripton: if you want your bot to make a fake reply when youre off,type yes to activate,else no (use small letters)

AUTO_SAVE_CONTACTS.description: new contacts will be automatically saved on your device type yes to activate,else no (use small letters)

AUTO_BIO.description: put yes to activate auto bio,,else no..(use small letters)

ANTICALL.description: if this feature is active,any incoming whatsapp call will be rejected,put yes to activate,else put no...(use small letters)

ANTEDELETE2.description: put yes to activate this antidelete,else put no..(This feature sends to your pm;use small letters)
